Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48174 affecting package busybox for versions less than 1.36.1-14
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-48174 affecting package busybox for versions less than 1.36.1-14. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package busybox is earlier than 1.36.1-14, affected by CVE-2022-48174
